transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: (div i (rows m) * rows m< power 2 n * rows m)

transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: (div j (columns m) * columns m< power 2 n * columns m)

transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: ((fun (k:int) -> indic (mod k v) p *. (g @ div k v)) e = (g @ div e v))

transf.arg1: ((fun (k:int) -> indic (mod k v) p *. (g @ div k v)) e' <> c_zero)

transf.arg1: (fun (b:int) -> indic (mod ((b * v) + p) v) p *. (g @ div ((b * v) + p) v))

transf.arg1: (fun (b:int) -> indic (mod ((b * v) + p) v) p *. (g @ div ((b * v) + p) v))

transf.arg1: ( (fun (b:int) -> (g @ mod ((p * v) + b) v) *. indic (div ((p * v) + b) v) p) e = g e)

transf.name: replace
transf.arg1: (ind_sum (fun (k:int) -> get m (div i (power 2 n)) k *. get o k (div j (power 2 n))) 0 (columns m))
transf.arg2: (ind_sum (fun (k:int) -> indic (mod k (power 2 n)) (mod i (power 2 n)) *. ((fun (e:int) -> get m (div i (power 2 n)) e *. get o e (div j (power 2 n))) @ div k (power 2 n))) 0 (power 2 n * columns m))

transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: ( div i (rows m)* rows m < power 2 n * rows m)

transf.arg1: ( ind_sum (fun (k:int) -> get (id_k_mat m n) i k *. get (id_k_mat o n) k j) 0 (columns m * power 2 n))

transf.arg1: ( ind_sum (fun (k:int) -> get (id_k_mat m n) i k *. get (id_k_mat o n) k j) 0 (columns (id_k_mat m n)))

transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: ((power 2 nc1 * div i (power 2 nr1)) <= (power 2 nc1 * (power 2 nr2 -1)))

transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: (div i (power 2 nr1) * (power 2 nr1) + mod i (power 2 nr1) <= power 2 nr2 * power 2 nr1)

transf.name: case
transf.arg1: (((indic (div i (rows m1)) (div k (columns m1)) *. get m1 (mod i (rows m1)) (mod k (columns m1))) *. (indic (mod k (power 2 nc1)) (mod j (power 2 nc1)) *. get m2 (div k (power 2 nc1)) (div j (power 2 nc1)))) <> c_zero)

transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: ( (power 2 nr2 * div j (power 2 nc2)) <= power 2 nr2 * (power 2 nc1 -1))

transf.name: replace
transf.arg2: (mat_mult (mat_k_id (mat_mult a c) rb) (id_k_mat (mat_mult b d) cc))

transf.arg2: (mat_mult (mat_k_id a rb) (mat_mult (mat_mult (id_k_mat b ca) (mat_k_id c cb)) (id_k_mat d cc)))

transf.arg1: (rows ((kronecker (make_ket l1 (fun (_:int) -> c_zero)) m)) = power_ 2 (l1 +' ket_length m))

transf.arg2: (kronecker m (ket_sum_l (n_bvs ln) (fun (x:bitvec) -> get_ket n (bv_to_int x) *.. bv_to_ket x) ln))

transf.arg1: ( n = (ket_sum_l (n_bvs ln) (fun (x:bitvec) -> get_ket n (bv_to_int x) *.. bv_to_ket x) ln))

transf.arg2: (ket_sum_l (n_bvs ln) (fun (bvx:bitvec) -> get_ket n (bv_to_int bvx) *.. ket ln (bv_to_int bvx)) ln)

transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: (forall o. n = o -> kronecker m n = kronecker m o)

transf.name: replace
transf.arg1: (ket_sum_l (n_bvs (i +' j)) (fun (k:bitvec) -> kronecker (f @ hpart k i) (g @ tpart k i)) (l1 +' l2))

transf.name: replace
transf.arg1: (get_ket m2 (div i (rows x')) *. get_ket x' (mod i (rows x')))

transf.arg1: (get_ket (kronecker m2 x') (i *' rows (x') +' ket_to_int x') = get_ket m2 i)

transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: (get_ket (kronecker m2 x') ((i *' rows x') +' ket_to_int x') = c_zero)

transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: (0 <> (rows m *' rows o) -'' (rows m' *' rows o))

transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: (0 <> (columns m *' columns o) -'' (columns m' *' columns o))

transf.name: case
transf.arg1: (exists i j. valid_index m i j && get m i j <> get m' i j)

transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: (exists i j. valid_index o i j && get o i j <> c_zero)

transf.name: assert
transf.arg1: (get (kronecker m o) (i1*' rows o +' i) (j1*' columns o +' j) <> get (kronecker m' o) (i1 *' rows o +' i) (j1 *' columns o +' j))
